cs.SE, cs.AI, cs.SY, cs.CR, cs.PL. 

The paper proposes a new paradigm for software systems to learn from their own failures, which falls under the category of software engineering (cs.SE). The proposed system uses advanced monitoring and exploration techniques, which involve artificial intelligence (cs.AI) and control systems (cs.SY). The paper also discusses the importance of assessing the recovery capabilities of the system, which relates to computer security (cs.CR). Finally, the paper mentions the design of the software system, which involves programming languages and compilers (cs.PL).
